content.detailedDescription: See them on a daily basis, please someone explain what we are seeing! there becoming more visable to us! my camera can't take a picture. i need a better camera?
content.summary: Lights moving side to side, than go from 0-100 in seconds...Stop than circle and speed again

content.detailedDescription: See them on a daily basis, please someone explain what we are seeing! there becoming more visable to us! my camera can't take a picture. i need a better camera?
content.summary: Lights moving side to side, than go from 0-100 in seconds...Stop than circle and speed again

content.detailedDescription: It was the 4th of july in lees summit, mo and we saw a burning ball of light that almost looked like one of those chinese lanterns. it hovered and came right to us, within 100 feet then took off in the distance and disappeared. we got into independence, mo and saw them all over the sky about 5 of them. we stopped at a stop sign and one was hovering over a house and again it was the same thing we seen in lees summit, it was a burning ball of fire it looked like with a slight tail behind it. we then drove towards our house and seen yet another in the distance and decided to follow it out of town. as we followed it, it kept getting higher and higher in the sky and started to pulsate light and then disappeared. we then went home and stood out on our back deck with binoculars and seen that the object definatly had a tail, was a burning ball of fire almost, and it looked to have a "eye" that was robotic that was looking all around! we watched about 5 more within the hour go west of our house and get higher in the sky, headed north and they would start pulsating and finally burn out high in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Burning light that hovered over city then dissapated.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking on my nightly walk down the road.Heading easterly.Always have on reflective vest and have flashlight. was about at the end of my turnaround, probably a half mile from my house when i saw a orange glowing ball or orb coming out of the north over the small mountains we have here into our valley. it was to the best of my reckoning to be under  five hundred feet, maybe less.It didn't pulse or have any exhaust that i could see. it was about halfway or more up from the horizon from being directly overhead of me. when it got above the highway i flashed my flashlight at it. it immediately stopped, started to glow a brighter reddish orange on it's side and was gone like a shot in the direction it came from. the best i can describe it's leaving is that it went so fast it was like it left tracers behind it.I continued my walk not sure what i saw. when i reached my turnaround and continued back towards the house (westerly), i had gone a 1/4 of the way back , constantly looking behind me, and the object came into view coming from the east(following the highway?) towards me. it didn't seem closer then the first time,just came from another direction.Once again i shined my flashlight at it and it went in the exact direction it came from, brightening up to the reddish orange color and gone in a blink.Haven't told anyone but my immediate  family.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walking, saw object moving towards highway, shown flashlight on it, it left in direction it came.

content.detailedDescription:
On a clear night in the country at my 2 story home, with 2nd story balcony's on both sides of my house. i walked out onto the southern balcony, and saw a cigar shaped huge ufo. it was black and made no sound. it was about 3 to 4 football fields long. at least 100 feet thick. it had windows in the front, the direction it was going and for 4 seconds they lit up from the inside and i could make out figures, human shaped, inside the craft. they had heads and necks. i could make out the outlines of them only. than the light inside the windows went off. it was heading east to west. across my 50 acre property. over the tall pine tress across the pond on the side and behind my home. i had a clear view of it. i was stunned, and watched it fly slow, about 50 or 60 mph, across my property. it made no sound what so ever. and it was totally black. my thoughts were that it was so low and could be seen so easily, who ever or what ever they were, they weren't trying to hide. i know what aircraft are and look like. i am world traveled and have seen all types of military and commercial aircraft. this was a real as it gets. 
 at the time i was watching tv, and got up to stretch and enjoy the evening sky at night. i had wonderful views from my balconies. 
 i could not have helped but to see this object, it was so huge. 
when i first saw it, i thought it was maybe, military. they are many military aircraft that fly over southern mississippi. 
 it flew right out of my sight over the trees and across my property. it never changed speed. speed was steady. it was not a blimp. i have seen blimps and they make sound, with there engines. this made no sound at all. and the windows of it were not below it, but in the front of it. in the nose. and it was metal. some kind of metal. i could make out that much.
content.summary: I saw a cigar shaped ufo 3-4 football fields long, low flying,silent,black

content.detailedDescription: I let my dogs out and was standing there while they did their business, and looked up.  it was a cloudy evening, and the sun had started to go down, but there was still some light behind the clouds, and i saw a huge, silent, completely dark thing moving across the clouds.  it was shaped like a milano cookie; not really an oval, but similar.  it made no sound at all, and moved very slowly.  i watched it in disbelief for a couple minutes, and it just moved across the sky.  every ufo sighting i ever heard of was an aircraft with lights, but this thing had no lights on it at all, and i wouldn't have even seen it except for the glow behind the clouds. it was just a huge, dark, silent, moving oval-like shaped thing.  i doubt this report is any help at all, but all those reports i see on tv had lights on the ufo, and i saw something with no lights, so maybe this is helpful.
content.summary: I was walking my dog and saw a silent, dark, huge, ship shaped like a milano cookie (not really an oval), very slowly moving across the sky as a dark shape against the clouds.  it was dusk and it had no lights on it, and made no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I had to separate incidents that couldnt be from this world it was shaped like a football about 6 to 10 ft long and it flew right passed me im a boilermaker and i was on the roof of the power plant it was pickaway power station i was talking to a fellow boilermaker so he saw it to if you want to call me thats ok it really freaked me out i now know we are not alone
content.summary: Glowing football about 6 to 10 ft long

content.detailedDescription:
I started out the 4th of july by taking shots of the neighborhood fireworks with my new digital camera, started taking the pictures at twilight.  had my digital camera set to "fireworks" mode for the longer exposure. (side note: not happy with the new camera. extended exposures create terrible halos, not a continuous exposure either.)

i immediately caught sight of a red orb moving parallel to the ground, at approximately the height of a low-flying passenger jet.  i caught sight of it so quickly, in fact, that the first sighting was my fifth photo of the night!  at first, i thought it was a plane catching the remaining light from the setting sun, but it couldn't be because i saw the same type of orb three times over about 30 minutes and by then all light was gone.  the orb was bright like fire.  it moved at a steady pace without deviating from its path...With the exception of one orb.  each time i saw the orb (or orbs), it was following the same north to south direction through the monroe valley.

i have digital photos (poor quality - see note at beginning) and a couple of videos (better quality).  

the still photos were taken with the "fireworks" setting of the new camera (canon powershot elph 110 hs).  instead of the usual streaking of light you would see with a typical long-exposure, this camera took three pics in quick succession and overlapped them.  so, the three pictures i have show three orbs connected...This is not the case.  it was one orb.  (i need a better camera!)  

the video was taken on the same camera and gives a much better view of the orb.  in the shorter of the two videos you can clearly see how bright red (& pulsing?) the orb was against the night sky.  in the longer video, you see the orb drastically change directions a few times.
content.summary: July 4, 2012 - monroe, wa - red orb(s) moving north to south

content.detailedDescription: I was on duty as the master-at-arms that night we were on the atlantic ocean coming home to mayport,fl. the ship was station out of mayport ,fl. our after lookout stopped something in the sky behind the ship and reported to the bridge to the ood(officer of the day) ,he ask cic if they had any thing on their radar and they said no,so the after look out was very sacred so the ood send me baack to check out on what the after lookout was looking at ,so i when to find out ,i had to hunt for the after lookout because he was hiding from the thing in the sky,so i found him and asked him what is all this about and he showed me by pointing at  so i said let me what i see so i look and he was right it was a disc(a ufo ,flying saucer, then i asked him for the soundpower phones we use for the lookouts on watch.  i askto speak to the ood and i told him what i am looking at and he said wait,next thing i knew the xo showed up back there where i was and the after lookout was standing . i showed the xo where to look and he seen the same thing both of us seen ,he asked for the sound power phones and told the ood to get the co ,and he came back there to see what us 3 were talking about he seen for himself and he got in touch with cic to see if they have anything on the radar and cic said no they don't and asked them why they don't and he went to cic to checked it out for his self and he came back to us and said that there was nothing on the radar ,so i knew that it was a ufo for real,yes i do believe in ufo's .Next thing i knew the spook team came back there with high power camera's and next thing a lot of the crew came back there with their camera's ,but when we pull into mayport and tired out to the pier ,next thing i knew there we men in black suits came on board and collected all the camera's from the crew and the spook team ,and a lot of us were intergated on what we seen out at sea . to whom it may concern i still remenber that night,i was 25 years old at that time now i am 64 years old now .I was at that time a gunnersmate third class ,( master- at -arms). i do not remenber the month but i know the year .
content.summary: The sighting was when i was in the navy aborad a navy ship sailing on the atlantic ocean in 1972 .
content.locationName: OUT ON THE ATLANTIC OCEAN, Florida

content.detailedDescription: Around 1:30pm i was sitting in the back yard starring up in the sky when i noticed a cloud forming. after it formed a  silver object appeared. i watched while this object started to move away from the cloud and start to move back and forth and then it hovered. i realized this was not an airplane so i went and grabbed my binoculars and zoomed in on it. the object was saucer shaped and the sun was gleaming off it. after awhile the object moved back in the cloud and the cloud vanished along with the object. i tried to get the sighting recorded but was unable to see the object. i have had many sightings over my life time and have learned to take notes.I was a witness to the '97 phoenix sighting while a truck driver. that object passed over me and i swear it was at least a mile wide. the object i saw today could only be seen with sunglasses.
content.summary: Around 1:30pm i noticed a cloud forming then a silver object emerged. i grabbed binoculars and notice that it was saucer shaped. then it disapeared in the cloud and the cloud vanished along with the object.

content.detailedDescription:
In the fall of 1986 i was headed up lake hill rd which is route 154. as i neared the top where there is a sharp left turn i noticed the trees blowing like crazy i found strange for a calm night. i slowed and notice a massive object and i mean massive this thing was 100 or so feet above tree tops and huge. the size of a football field or bigger. i stopped in the road in disbelief. this thing just slowed as i watched it and had lights but not real bright or directive. as i watched it headed toward the west. the wind calmed and it was gone. this thing was massive and very quiet other than the wind around it. i was about 18 years old at the time and didn't tell anybody figuring they would just laugh and call me crazy. 

years later i was talking to a cousin who was on the other side of the mountain had seen the same thing. the same night.

at first sight i thought it may be a plane or blimp. but this thing was way to big way to quite and way to strange. had i had a camera or technology we do today i would have been filming like crazy. 

i know this happend i seen it i'm not nuts crazy or insane. i wish i had talked about it when it happend.

in the field apparent size. if you held an aircraft carrier at arms length you might cover it.
content.summary: A massive object caused the wind to blow the trees almost bent from the force.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling along yellowstone lake. i took a series of pictures of the snow covered mountains. when i down loaded the pictures into my computer, i noticed on one frame what appeared as a small object in the upper left corner. i thought it was a large bird so i started enlarging it. after the third enlargement, i realized it was no bird! i printed the object and it is in my pocession. i took a series of 3 pictures. in frame #1, it's not there. in frame #2, it's there. in frame #3 again, it's not there. it appears to be a cylinder shape with no wings, propellers, or motors that can be seen. everone we've shown this picture including the local tv news station in idaho falls have said the same thing....It's a ufo. however, no body has contacted us on whether it's a real ufo. the original pictures are still in my computer.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the yellowstone mountains

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friend's house in january 10th of 1981 in l.A. calif.  he was in the shower so i was the only witness.  something told me to look out the window so i did and i saw one ufo on the far right of of hollywood hills and saw it slowly glide towards my center vision and it was hovering in front of the maxfield building downtown l.A.
i was estastic.  i looked at the clock.  it was 6:30 p.M. pacific time.  it was silver in color disc shaped and had red lights beaming out of the portholes.  it was in plain view and the craft's metal shined from the sunset.  it hovered for approximately seven minutes.  it then slowly glided to the left upwards towards the moon.  as i saw it, there was another one exactly like the first one.  i was indoors looking out a bay window but heard no sound.  i was estatic and overwhelmed. excited.  all my life i wanted to be a witness to such an event. and, it happened.
i told my friend about it who was taking a shower at the time but he didn't  believe me because he did not see them but as god as my witness, i saw them with my own two eyes.
content.summary: 2 silver disc shaped with red portholes beaming out

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friend's house in january 10th of 1981 in l.A. calif.  he was in the shower so i was the only witness.  something told me to look out the window so i did and i saw one ufo on the far right of of hollywood hills and saw it slowly glide towards my center vision and it was hovering in front of the maxfield building downtown l.A.
i was estastic.  i looked at the clock.  it was 6:30 p.M. pacific time.  it was silver in color disc shaped and had red lights beaming out of the portholes.  it was in plain view and the craft's metal shined from the sunset.  it hovered for approximately seven minutes.  it then slowly glided to the left upwards towards the moon.  as i saw it, there was another one exactly like the first one.  i was indoors looking out a bay window but heard no sound.  i was estatic and overwhelmed. excited.  all my life i wanted to be a witness to such an event. and, it happened.
i told my friend about it who was taking a shower at the time but he didn't  believe me because he did not see them but as god as my witness, i saw them with my own two eyes.
content.summary: 2 silver disc shaped with red portholes beaming out

content.detailedDescription: I would like someone there to check this out & see what they can make of it, if you will. myself as well as several others were here celebrating the 4th & happened to notice the full moon, one deciding to take some pictures with his fairly expensive camera. nothing incredible showed up at first glance, but then the photographer decided to zoom in & started getting different sized red, white, & blue lights appearing in the digital photographs, which were not apparently visible through the camera scope alone, nor to the naked eye. he showed a few others his pics, & upon seeing them i ran to get my telescope. it is not much for a tele mind ya, but i couldn't see the objects with it either. we took turns looking through the tele as the photographer continued taking pictures, almost all of which captureded these mysterious lights, but in different locations each time, as if they were moving. i messed with the digital images on my pc some, magnifying some pictures to try & gain a better understanding of exactly what we may be looking at.. but retained the originals as well as their filenames when saving magnified images. i'm not in a good situation financially at the moment, so mailing or 'ups'-ing may not be the best means for me at this time, but i have all the pictures both on my pc & on flashdrive here, if there is some way i can email or otherwise post them(?) also, only lately have i begun 'looking up' quite so much, as recent sightings while out with freinds have been recurring to the point it's almost impossible not to notice.. awhile after dusk on june 10 2012, while finishing up a game of 21 (basketball) at the lawrence township recreation park in clearfield pa, one of the 5 adults & 5 children there at the time (i think it was amber, my fiance') made a comment to the effect of "wow, wtf is that?!" & pointed to an extremely bright light in the sky. all of the adults & all but 1 of the children took immediate notice of the almost unnaturally bright light seemingly hovering motionlessly overhead, & in as little time as it took for me to think "whoa that can't be venus because it just passed in front of the sun a few days ago & isn't out this early in the night this time of year" the object suddenly decreased significantly in luminousity, then accellerated towards what i believe to be a south-eastern-ish direction. it continued it's direction of travel for several seconds while the light faded & brightened several times before apparently vanishing into thin air. about a week later, while saying our so-longs & such, a younger brother of one of the witnesses to the first sighting was preparing to leave my place when i noticed a very similar bright white light in the southern sky traveling at a fairly quick rate of speed in an eastern direction. i pointed it out to my freind, and he 'kept an eye on it' as i ran to get my telescope. but, of course, by the time i returned with it, according to my friend, it had also just disappeared. neither of the first 2 encounters were photographed, unfortunately, & those incedents may or may not be related in any way, but seeing as these are the first we've managed to actually photograph i would love for someone who has seen much more than i could hope to have a look and see what they think of it all.. thanks for your time!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Red, white & blue lights near moon 7-4-12, brightly pulsating, accelerating, disapearring white lights 6-10-12

content.detailedDescription: Picnic point area, between edmonds, lynnwood and mukilteo, wa. 12:30 am the  morning of july 5, after a night of shooting fireworks and cleaning up in front of my house, i was moving my vehicles  back into my driveway when i noticed an unusual light in the sky. it appeared bigger than most low flying plane lights. it did not resemble a satellite or iss. it was traveling generally from north to south at constant speed, it was glowing orange in color, which i found unusual for the usual objects i normally see in the night sky. this is what drew my attention to the object. i live by paine field and see all kinds of aircraft flying thru the night sky. it appeared to be pulsating or flashing. at first i thought it might be a plane. i rushed to my vehicle and retrieved my binoculars. the object looked like a big orange ball of light with a brighter smaller light at it center. it did not appear to change course. as it approached closer to me the whole object seem to fade and then disappear without a trace. it made no sound at all.
content.summary: Observed with  naked eye and binoculars a pulsating orange orb traveling in straight line above house  then slowly faded away into completely clear night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i had just pulled into parking lot at our apartment building  after eating dinner and getting some fireworks. was very quite out . as we unloaded the car we looked up and in the distance wittnessed a football shaped object glowing  an orangeish red color.

at first we thought is was some sort of fire work but it hovored there for a minute then moved off to the north behind the tree line without a sound and without exploding. then it circled back around   after a minute or so.

it continued to hover for a few seconds then in the blink of an eye it was gone just zipped off .Went to take a phone on cell phone  but was so far away that nothing was captured . think that is everything have not seen anything sense but would like to know what we did see
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange in color glowing fast not a sound

content.detailedDescription: I was brushing my teeth inside my house at about 10:50 pm when something (a flash of light maybe)caught my attention out of the corner of my eye. i turned and looked out the window and their was an unidentified object hovering in the sky. i have seen planes fly in the sky late at night before but this was definately not a plane. to describe the object i would have to say that it was like looking into the sun or a light bulb, only this light was solid, and as far as i could tell it was not giving off any rays of light. it was white/yellow in color and had a disc shape to it. the object hovered in the sky close to the tree line just outside my neighborhood. then it disappeared and reappeared slightly lower to the ground and of to the right a little (all in a instant),hovered for a moment, disappeared again, then it reappeared a little higher and slightly of to the right more then it was originally. again the object hovered for a moment before it took off straight up, its path tilted only a fraction to the right going up, leaving a small trail of light behind it. it took off so fast that even though i never blinked it was like it was their and then it wasn't. the short trail of light(?)left behind disappeared about a second later, leaving me standing their thinking oh my god i just saw a ufo. because the object did not make any noise all, the other members of my family slept soundly through the whole thing. still in shock i ran into my parents room and said "i just saw a ufo." still half asleep my mother mumbled "what" rolled over and fell back asleep. my father got kind of mad that i woke him up and so he mumbled "get out of my room i'm trying to sleep" so i responded "fine, i just saw a ufo but whatever...." and started i to walk out of the room. now awake my father said something to the effect of "what? you saw a ufo!?" and then i told him what just happened. then i went into my sisters room, woke her up and told her what happened. after that i went back to bed,and prayed that i wouldn't be abducted or anything. i still have no clue what that object was... it was like nothing i have ever seen before. strangely enough i saw the same thing a week latter, and the setting was exactly the same. i was brushing my teeth, everyone else was asleep, same time, and like i said, same object. and another thing, the only light on in my house at the time was a small night light around a corner from where i was standing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid light object that does not give off light, quick changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 9 june 1987, we were in the new river mountains on a research trip, documenting pollinators of a rare plant over a 24-hour period.  we were about 2 hours into our observation period, looking north, when one of us turned around (facing south) and saw a very large, bright light.  the light seemed to be positioned over the south end of the bradshaw mountains, although it was difficult to perceive exactly where and at what elevation (although it was certainly west of interstate 17).  what immediately struck us was its size ��� it seemed to be above a large part of the southern end of this large mountain range.   it was very bright, shaped like a narrow, stretched oval and was motionless.  we stood mesmerized, afraid to get a camera or binoculars lest it disappear.  within a minute or two, a large, solid light formation, emanated from the stationary horizontal light, moving slowly downward towards what we perceived as ground.  this downward moving solid light was similar in width to the main horizontal light above. the horizontal light remained and did not change. when the downward moving light reached what we perceived as solid ground, it then reversed its direction and traveled upward, as a solid light formation, slowly back to the main horizontal light. when it reached the horizontal light, the latter slowly turned into a huge blue ball. when the ball formed, it immediately started to vaporize ��� the blue ball started to disappear, turning into wisp-like clouds.  eventually (a minute or two) the blue ball completely disappeared and all that was left was the cloud-like bodies.  after another minute or two, eventually these disappeared too, until nothing was left.  we were dumb-founded.  although we continued our plant research observations through the night, we talked of our more interesting light sighting non-stop.  the sighting was a phenomenal occurrence for me, forever changing my life.
content.summary: Observed a huge stationary light that emitted a solid light below, which traveled to ground, back up to main light, became a ball, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Around 4 am i stepped out on my deck and in my peripheral i noticed a huge, bright blue, star-like orb hovering silently se of the corner of westport rd. and goose creek rd. to the right of the orb was the moon but yet the orb seemed much brighter than the moon. quickly i called for my girlfriend to come witness what i was seeing and since she was close by she was able to see this object start moving then fade out. this sighting only lasted 12-15 seconds but it had a lasting effect. i felt as though i was being watched and that there was some intelligent design behind this object. my girlfriend could not explain what we had just seen and was obviously shaken up. this is just one of many reoccurring events that have taken place over the past month.
content.summary: Walked out on deck and noticed a very bright blue star-like orb hovering off in the distance. it appeared to start moving and either ascended or just faded out..

content.detailedDescription: My wife and son were driving home from vacation on main street in eaton, oh when i noticed a flying object in the air straight in front of us. i got one of feelings that tells you that the object doesn't look familiar and you instantly start feeling like you're witnessing a ufo. well it made it all more real when the object flew out of sight behind a small group of trees and when we passed the group of trees the object was gone. i thought i was crazy until my wife also started asking where it had gone. i slowed down enough to scan the whole sky and we found nothing. the skies were clear and there was no possible way a airplane could have vanished that quickly after leaving our vision behind a group of trees.
content.summary: "disc like" ufo spotted over eaton, then disappears out of plain sight!

content.detailedDescription:
I was enjoying a lite dinner at my local beach.  the sky was covered in a solid mass of thick clouds and the ceiling was low in preparation for heavy, late night thunderstorms.  i happen to look up and noticed a trail in the cloud cover.  looking closer i realized there were two trails traveling in parallel.  i could visually follow something which was traveling just under the bottom of the ceiling.  it disturbed the cloud cover, and left the parallel trail behind as it moved. it never seemed to break the surface of the clouds however. suddenly, while following the movement i lost site of it.  i searched the sky carefully, checking back where it came from, to the north, as well as an anticipated path off to the north east. nothing.  so, i went back to where i had lost site and began searching there again.  suddenly, it seemed to pop out below the cloud cover.  surprisingly though, the object remained covered in clouds.  i was unable to identify anything about it except that it appeared to be oval in shape and there were no wings.  that was interesting!  i continued to observe it as it traveled a short distance along the shoreline before mading another small directional change which took it out through conscience bay to port jefferson harbor where i lost site of the trail. 
     when the object was visiable, it seemed to serge through the clouds almost like a dolphin's push as it breaks the water's surface while moving forward.  it did not however bend it's body as it settled back down.
     i heard no noise as i watched.  i'm not sure how low the cloud cover was.  this information would be easily located in local weather reports.  i viewed the trail and accompanying object at approximately a forty-five degree angle  from the beach.  its approximate size was difficult to estimate. however, i believe if you held a nickel out and up at arms length it would be a good indicator of the width of the parallel trail.  this in turn would identify the width of the object. the speed is more difficult to identify. it was definitely a little faster than a private plane and obviously much slower than an airliner. this was a very interesting sighting.
content.summary: ewhile visiting my local beach early one evening i observed a disturbance in the cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside sitting on our deck, which is on the south side of our house, watching the neighborhood kids in the apartment complex on the south side of 79th street shoot there fire works. it was approx 9:42pm. i saw what appeared to be a glowing object coming from the south. as i watched it it became bigger. first thinking it was some sort of a new firework. after a few minutes i realized that it couldn't be. because no smoke trail was being left. behind the first one was two more. both were identical to the first. no sound was coming from these objects. the path that these objects were on was at first on a north northwest path and then made a change to a north north east path. these objects glowed red/orange/white. changing randomly. i watched these objects for approximately 10 minutes until i lost site of them over the trees to the northwest of my residence.
content.summary: Appeared to be 3 orbs. on the same flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, i saw it too, same city, same object - on july 3rd at around 10:20p.M. i got the urge to put my clothes on and go for a walk around the block. in the last year i have never gone on a walk at night, none the less the day. i just had this sudden urge, and i had to go.
i walked around the block and as i came around to my street which is a street springfield oregon i noticed towards the north eastern sky i noticed a giant red-ish orange-ish orb in the sky, it was phucking huge, way too big, i mean, it looked like a small fire in the sky. it was kinda pulsating, and i could tell it wasn't moving because the stars behind it, which dwarfed in comparison referenced the orb as to not moving. what i mean to say is, the orb and the stars were stationary. they weren't moving. but the orb was pulsating, and i began to freak out because i wanted someone to see it too. so i ran back 50 feet to where i saw someone getting groceries out of their trunk but they had already gone inside their apartment. so i ran back to the street and the orb was still there. a man was getting in his jeep, well he was putting stuff in his jeep, but getting ready to go there was a lady in the driver seat with the engine on. i yelled at him "hey do you see that there, do you see that?!!!" he first said no, and as i pointed towards the sky, towards this huge red-ish orange-ish orb that was wayyyyy up in the sky, but was way to big to be something we could familiarize ourselves with, and that's when he said "yea...Yea i do see that" i told him "watch, it's going to disappear" and after about fifteen seconds the orb kinda dipped, but it was so far up there, it was a big move, and then it shot into space, i mean, it went out of our atmosphere, it slowly turned into a small dot which was eventually gone into the stars. i looked back at the man and said "see you just saw your first ufo now go study" he didn't say anything back to me.
content.summary: Had the urge to go outside, never done that before. saw the red orb, then it took off into space after a 45 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
July 4th 2012.
on deck at home watching fireworks in the area. the moon had just come up above the horizon, east. i had been looking to the south from our deck at home, turned to see if we could see other fireworks to the east. when i did there was this massive fiery red diamond shaped in the sky. i asked my sister what the heck is that? we then stood memorized watching this thing. with the moon just above the horizon we'd say it was about a quarter of the size of the moon. this thing was in the forefront the moon would have been in the background.
now this was a diamond shape when you were looking at it head on, not from below.
it moved very slowly to the north, there was no sound, it then moved slightly east and then slowly descended below the tree line.
there we no vapor trails, no engine sounds, no flashing lights, it didn't look as if it spun or turned. 
again it was massive and the whole thing seemed very surreal, both me and my sister felt pretty weird-ed  out by the whole thing.
content.summary: Large red diamond firery red moved very very slowly horizontally then desended

content.detailedDescription:
The first light is clear, the next light is larger that is orange and it appears to have a tail with a light on the end that flashes red randomly. 

i noticed because it was bright through my window. then the light where moving very slowly. i know that they were not stars. they seem too mechanical in movement and the tail on the second one with the flashing red light. this was not a star and they moved slowly across the sky.
content.summary: The first light is clear, the next light is larger that is orange and it appears to have a tail with a light on the end that flashes red randomly.

content.detailedDescription: On the fourth of july, we were watching fireworks.  in the corner of my eye i saw a red orb like light in the sky.  at first i thought that it was a firework that was going up into the sky about to go off, however, it stayed in the orb like state and started to move west to east over the top of some homes in the area. i had my camera that takes hd video and filmed the object. then it gradually turned and went back west and then disappeared over the oquirrh mountains. i live near an airport that has both civilian and military aircraft and it did not look like an aircraft that we have seen before. as it was all red and orange and was a sphere shape . where on an airplane there is a blue/green light on one wing and a red light on the other and one in the middle.It was not flying in the normal flight path from north to south or south to north. it was moving east to west across the flight path. there were airplanes in the area looking at the fireworks in the area flying north to south at around the same elevation. they do this every year to watch the fireworks. this was much bigger then a helicopter or an airplane and it was a solid sphere shaped object. we could not figure out what this could be, as we have lived here for 13 plus years and are very familiar with all kinds of aircraft flying over our home. after watching the video that we took of it we couldn't come up with an answer to what this was. the area over the oquirrh mountains has many sightings of strange objects and has also been featured on many tv shows for issues like this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orb  like light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10 pm on the 4th of july in 2012, so about 2 days ago. me and my dad were outside, watching the fireworks, as well as lighting off a couple of bottle rockets. i looked up in the sky during a period where there were no firework explosions going off. it was eerily quiet. there was a red object in the sky. i told my dad, "look at that, that's not a helicopter,  or a plane, or a firework." we observed it for a few minutes, and when i got my phone out to take a picture, my phone died. i had just charged it that morning. as we watched, it slowly moved towards us, then hooked to the south. immediately afterword, it got dimmer and dimmer until it just disappeared. my dad then went to the store, and while he was gone, i looked north, towards the golf course. i saw two objects that looked like exact replicas of the first object. as i watched, they flashed slightly, then were gone. as soon as my dad got back, i saw another one of these objects to the east, the same direction as the first one. as it got closer, it slowly got dimmer, then it increased in brightness momentarily, then was gone. the next day, my mom was told by one of her coworkers that him and his wife had observed the final object just as we had. the only difference is that they saw one go towards the ground and possibly land to the west. when they tried to take a picture, their camera was malfunctioning, not allowing them to snap an image of the craft. none of us could hear any sound whatsoever.
content.summary: I saw multiple stange objects in the sky, and they weren't fireworks

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home after work, at about 9:30 pm on juune 30, 2012.  travelling north on bell rd., i was distracted by a triangular formation of 3 blue-white lights on my left that were particularly low on the horizon(about 15 degrees).  confused at their unusual color and formation, i slowed down to about 20 mph in order to look for any flashing avaition indicators and could find none evident during the incident. since there was not enough shoulder i was unable to stop and get out.
coming from out of the west, and travelling a straight line path from 10 o'clock to 4 o'clock it became obvious as they passed over the road that they were glowing spheres and not any lights associated with any normal avaiton lights associated with conventional aircraft. they did not appear to be part of a single craft but it was too dark behind the spheres bo be sure.  after about 20 seconds they had moved too far east of my position to see while i was still driving the car. unfortunately i did not get out of the car to continue further observation and they passed overhead and out of sight.  i estimate their size at around 30-50ft in diameter, spaced about 150-200ft apart, at an elevation of approximately 1000-1500ft, with a speed no greater than 150-200mph. 
i have seen plenty of aircraft in the area, as there are many that are on their descent paths to midway airport from there, but they travel south north and are still at least 10 times higher than these objects.  
their warning lights are also clearly visible even at that altitude.
content.summary: 3 silent objects moved slowly across my point of view while i was driving home.

content.detailedDescription:
Couldn't sleep, outside to smoke. noticed that the stars by the moon were orange and thought it interesting. then noticed a larger object like an orange fireball moving at the same speed a plane or helicopter would move about 45 degrees above horizon; maybe twice the size of how a low-flying plane would look. freaked me out at first; i wanted to turn around and go back inside, but had to get a better look. object continued on a straight trajectory from north to south and became fainter and fainter, not so much like it was going farther away, but more like it was burning out. it ultimately became as small as the orange stars by the moon. i had no idea what it was, but after it had faded speculated that it could have been a meteorite (never seen one of those, either; just "shooting stars"). i was just awed at the sight, as in "holy crap" awed.

went back inside and googled god knows how many different terms related to ufos and meteors in my area and came up with nothing. no meteor showers are "scheduled" by mother nature at this time; nobody else reported seeing it. 

so...Early stages of schizophrenia, meteorites, or something else? i've never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Two orange stars close to the gibbous moon; one large fireball moving at speed of a plane.
